Load data from URL
```{r}
gdURL  <-  "http://tiny.cc/gapminder"
gDat  <- read.delim(file = gdURL)
head(gDat)
```

Load ggplot2
```{r}
library(ggplot2)
```

```{r, echo=FALSE}
p  <- ggplot(gDat, aes(x = log10(gdpPercap), y = lifeExp))
p + geom_point()

```
